testsuite.name: Salary Range Filtering - Critical Null Handling

testcase.name: should return only RANGE_25_30K records when RANGE_25_30K filter is selected
should return ONLY records with NULL salary when filter is null
should NOT mix null and non-null salary ranges when filter is null
should return only OVER_30K records when OVER_30K filter is selected
should return only UNDER_25K records when UNDER_25K filter is selected
